title: Buckle guard

claims.preamble: The ornamental design for a buckle guard, substantially as shown and described.

description: FIG. 1 is a left side elevational view of the buckle guard of the present invention.
FIG. 2 is a right side elevational view of the buckle guard of the present invention.
FIG. 3 is a rear elevational view of the buckle guard of the present invention.
FIG. 4 is a front elevational view of the buckle guard of the present invention.
FIG. 5 is a bottom view of the buckle guard of the present invention.
FIG. 6 is a top view of the buckle guard of the present invention.
FIG. 7 is a first perspective view of the buckle guard of the present invention from the right rear, with the apparatus inverted; and,
FIG. 8 is a second perspective view of the buckle guard of the present invention from the front left side.
